message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I'm feeling generous, but let's make it worthwhile for both of us.
Come on, Bob, meet me in the middle!
This is my final offer, Alice. Let's close the deal and avoid further losses from inflation.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's be reasonable and split it evenly. It's the only fair way to end this.
Your 'fair' offer came a bit too late, I'm afraid
